group_1.textRight: We can't...let it end this way...

group_1.textLeft: This task was entrusted to us by the@Magius Three.
There's no way we can simply abandon it...

group_1.narration: We took care of that bozo @from earlier no problem, but...@Here's some more clowns@to block our path again.
I figured we could just @bust through 'em like we did@with the earlier ones, but...

group_1.textRight: Your Soul Gem... It's almost out of magic...
In what world is a tainted Soul Gem good?

group_1.textLeft: This may just be quite the fortuitous@opportunity for all of you.

group_1.textRight: You shall see why Kamihama is a @[textRed:place of liberation].

group_1.textLeft: And you'll get to witness it with your very @own eyes!

group_1.narration: After celebratin' how murky their Soul Gems@had gotten, some creepy, strange@"thing" appeared from their bodies.

group_1.textCenter: Hey, hold on...wait just a sec... What the@hell is this?!

group_1.textRight: That "thing" saved us all when it came@out of Iroha last time.
But facing it in battle, you can really@feel just how powerful it is...
Somethin' like THAT came out of you, too?

group_1.textCenter: Come across a Witch that could pass as @a human?

group_1.textRight: You must be that "Humanoid Witch"  @that Mami was talkin' about...
Geeze, I sure did figure out how@dangerous that thing is now...

group_1.textCenter: Now, if you want to get past us you must@put your life on the line.
How thoughtful. It even counts down the@minutes for us.
Oh man, this is really gettin' bad now...

group_1.narration: If these rumors do really come true,@then I should have about 30 minutes until@the disaster comes crashin' down on me.
I can't afford to be stuck here.@I haven't even seen what@the monster looks like yet.

group_1.textCenter: Can I get a cup too?

group_1.narration: It was the three of us who drank the @water and got caught up in this rumor.
So as the victims of this rumor,@the three of us decided to head@straight for the Uwasa while@the others dealt with the nutjobs.

group_1.textLeft: I was thinkin' I'd just lose you guys@somewhere and beat this Uwasa myself...
But it's going to take all three of us@to even stand a chance.

group_1.textRight: You were going to "lose us"? [chara:100100:lipSynch_0][freeze:1.0][chara:100100:cheek_0][chara:100100:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100100:motion_400][chara:100100:lipSynch_1]You@seriously were thinking about that?!

group_1.textLeft: The Uwasa aren't like Witches, right?
So you can't say for sure that everyone@will wind up fine after you defeat one...
But we don't have time to worry about@that right now.

group_1.narration: I just hated the thought of everyone@else gettin' first dibs before me and@leavin' me behind in the dust.
I wanted to just lose them, and go ahead@and knock the Uwasa out on my own...@But I'm past the point where@I can tell them that kind of junk.
I wanna bet on the chance that we make it@out victorious, instead of dyin' here in vain. @And the best way to make that bet is@to use all our might to tackle that thing.

group_1.textCenter: Doesn't matter who gets saved in the end.@No regrets!
